did.abstract: Typescript of "Some Aspects of Negro-Jewish Relationships in Detroit, Michigan," by Eleanor Wolf, Vin Loving, and Donald Marsh.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a typescript copy of "Some Aspects of Negro-Jewish Relationships in Detroit, Michigan," by Eleanor Wolf, Vin Loving, and Donald Marsh.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.
